name: EUROPEAN HOTEL FORUM
memberOrga: AccorHotels, Carlson Rezidor, Nordic Choice, CitizenM, Hilton Worldwide, Hyatt, IHG, Marriott International, Wyndham
goal: The European Hotel Forum is founded as a pan-European forum to research hospitality-related issues and take action on them as appropriate through legislative, policy, media and hotel industry educational venues.
interests: Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, General and Institutional Affairs, Single market
euInitiatives:
- Tourism policy
- Competition policy
- Consumer protection
- Single Market
- Digital Single Market
